    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static FarmDAO getInstance(Player currentPlayer)
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer -
        Returns:
        a singleton instance of the DAO and load it with the current player's data

      • loadPlayerData

        private void loadPlayerData(Player currentPlayer)
        Loads the specified player's plots from the csv file and assigns it to instance attribute plots. Also sets the currentPlayer instance attribute to the specified player. This method also does a check to ensure that the player has the correct number of plots as defined by his rank. This method should be called on the singleton instance whenever a new player logs in
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer -

      • read

        private java.util.ArrayList<Plot> read()
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of the plots of land that belong to the current player

      • save

        public void save()
        Saves the current state of ArrayList into the currentPlayer's directory

      • addPlots

        public void addPlots(int num)
        Adds the specified num of plots to the player's farm
        Parameters:
        num - number of plots to add

      • getPlots

        public java.util.ArrayList<Plot> getPlots()
        Gets the plot of currentPlayer
        Returns:
        an ArrayList containg the currentPlayer's plots of land

      • getPlot

        public Plot getPlot(int n)
        Gets the plot
        Parameters:
        n - the plot number, where n ranges from 1 - number of plots the player has
        Returns:
        plot
